commands.tooltip: run mocha tests in docker container
commands.command: docker exec node-boilerplate-app_node_1 npm run mocha

commands.tooltip: run codecept tests in docker container
commands.command: docker exec node-boilerplate-app_node_1 npm run codecept run --steps --verbose

commands.tooltip: run knex seeds in docker container
commands.command: docker exec node-boilerplate-app_node_1 npm run knex seed:run

commands.tooltip: run knex migrations in docker container
commands.command: docker exec node-boilerplate-app_node_1 npm run knex migrate:latest
